intro: Dorystigma squarrosum, commonly known as the squarrosum daisy, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies, sunflowers, and other similar plants. The plant features showy yellow flowers surrounded by white ray florets, making it visually striking. It typically grows in grasslands and rocky areas, preferring well-drained soils. Dorystigma squarrosum is often used in gardens for its ornamental value and drought tolerance.
